SELECT sa.id as sa_id,sav.id sav_id, sa.*,sav.*,if( ssav.sku_id IS NOT NULL, 1, 0 ) AS isChecked
FROM pms_product_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN pms_product_sale_attr_value sav ON sa.sale_attr_id = sav.sale_attr_id AND sa.product_id = sav.product_id AND sa.product_id = #{spuId} LEFT JOIN pms_sku_sale_attr_value ssav ON ssav.sale_attr_id = sa.sale_attr_id AND ssav.sale_attr_value_id = sav.id AND ssav.sku_id = #{skuId} ORDER BY sav.sale_attr_id
